short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for CDA service blocking unwanted advertisements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for CDA service blocking unwanted advertisements.
It blocks requests CDA force you to send, you control which requests you want to let through.
